dcterms:description: HiSCORE data enable to reconstruct air shower characteristics, such as air shower energy, arrival direction, and axis coordinates.
dcterms:title: HiSCORE events

dcterms:description: Monte-Carlo simulation made possible modeling events with set EAS parameters, such as air shower axis coordinates, primary particle type, polar and azimuth angles of air shower axis, and primary particle energy.
dcterms:title: Monte-Carlo simulated events
